testcases_summary: The unit tests verify the account opening functionality, covering scenarios including successful account opening, account opening failure, backend processing error, and invalid input handling.
The tests verify the service modification endpoint's handling of successful requests, failure scenarios, SQLAlchemy exceptions, invalid JSON inputs, and database connection issues.
The tests verify the functionality of saving account opening requests in the AccountRepository, including handling successful saves, missing and partial data, null data, and SQL execution failures.

The tests verify the functionality of the save_service_modification_request method in the ServiceModificationRepository. They cover scenarios such as successful data insertion, handling of empty or partial data, missing user ID, invalid data types, and null inputs.

The tests validate the AccountService's process_opening_request method, covering scenarios for successful processing, missing mandatory fields (name, email, phone), empty mandatory fields, and handling backend exceptions.

The tests verify the functionality of the process_modification_request method in the ServiceModificationService class, covering scenarios such as successful processing, missing mandatory fields, empty fields, and backend exceptions.
